name: Prompt Engineer/Analyst
description:
ONSITE in Minsk

Future is coming… Are you ready to be at the forefront of the language modelling industry? We're looking for a Prompt Engineer to join our team and work on exciting AI projects that are shaping the future. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to make a real impact with your skills and expertise

Webbee is a German-based company with a branch in Minsk, dedicated to creating software solutions for businesses (b2b). Our latest mission is to revolutionize data management applications with our no-code platform, Bamboo, and we're now incorporating the latest AI technologies to take it even further.

Your mission is:

Working closely with our Senior Backend engineer to develop an application which can generate training data for teaching a data management app to a custom language model inspired by Stanford Alpaca.

Your main responsibilities will include:

  • Brainstorming over 500 use cases of the chat

  • Creating over 10 million training data sets (prompt-answer)

  • Directing our Senior Backend engineer on what you need to generate amazing training data ‍

You are a perfect match for us if you have:

  • Some management skills (20% manager) ‍

  • Excellent Excel skills (you are advanced in formulas, and filtering)

  • A creative mindset

  • A passion for learning new things

  • An energetic and open attitude

  • Fluency in English ️(B2 IS MINIMUM)

  • Ready to work ONSITE in Minsk

Why join us:

  • Competitive salary pegged to the Euro

  • Free access to AllSports (more than 488 sports centers across Belarus) ️‍

  • Courses to help you keep reaching new heights in your career ‍

  • Our corporate chef will take you on a culinary journey with Belarusian, Indian, and many other cuisines ️

  • A cozy cottage office with a garden to help you feel at ease and inspired

  • Eco-vegetables and berries in our yard which are available for all employees

We have a thorough hiring process that includes:

  • Screening interview with HR (45 min)

  • Take-home assignment

  • Presentation of take-home assignment and obtaining feedback (1h)

  • Final talk with CEO ‍

We are excited to hear from you and learn about your skills and passions!

A cover letter is a must!
